title: Mike DeWine
summary: Richard Michael DeWine (born January 5, 1947) is an American politician and attorney serving as the 70th governor of Ohio since 2019. A member of the Republican Party, DeWine previously served as Ohio Attorney General from 2011 to 2019, United States Senator from 1995 to 2007, Lieutenant Governor of Ohio under George Voinovich from 1991 until 1994, and U.S. Representative from 1983 until 1991.
